Wedding Event Terms & Conditions

  • Retainer: 10% of total or $500 minimum (whichever is greater) required upon contract signature to secure booking
  • Payment Terms: Remaining balance due in full before event date
  • Billing: Milestone-based billing structure
  • Cancellation Policy: Retainer is retained on cancellation. If expenses exceed retainer, the difference will be billed. A cancellation fee applies.
  • Postponement: Expenses incurred up to postponement date must be paid
  • Insurance: Liability coverage included in package
  • Setup/Teardown: Included in quoted price
